text: Ese umwe muri mwe yakwifuza kugira umurima w’itende n’imizabibu utembamo imigezi, akawugiramo n’imbuto z’amoko yose, maze yagera mu zabukuru anafite abana b’abanyantege nke (nta cyo bakwimarira), nuko ugaterwa n`inkubi y`umuyaga irimo umuriro mwinshi, maze ugakongoka? (Uru ni rwo rugero rw’abatanga imitungo yabo batagamije kwishimirwa na Allah, bazabura ibihembo ku munsi wimperuka mu gihe bari babikeneye.) Uko ni ko Allah abereka ibimenyetso (byibibafitiye umumaro kugira mumwereze ibikorwa no) kugira ngo mutekereze
